thread.title: DEREK
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by DEREK

author: DEREK
title: DEREK
text:
We rented a car at the last moment with a spontaneous trip to the sunshine coast. It all worked exactly as it should and as we would expect. The car was clean and again presented as new as it should. We dropped the car off at Brisbane without any hassle at all. As s suggestion a sign in the carpark at the sunshine airport pointing to the Redspot bays would help as it is easy to walk past the other car rental bays and not see Redspot at the end.
Happy to use Redspot again.
